import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import "./DatosCarro.css"; import '../../index.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; export const DatosCarro = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); // Declaraciones para botones const {register, handleSubmit} = useForm(); const onSubmit = (data) => { console.log(data); navigate("/cotizacion3" , state = {data}); } return ( <>
